# Hail of Ectoplasm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 action

**Components:** V, S, M (a handful of resin marbles)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** 10-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 54

An explosion of spheres of hardened ectoplasm occurs from a point you designate. The spheres deal 1d6 points of bludgeoning damage per two caster levels (maximum 5d6) to creatures within the effect. The ectoplasm decays into nothingness after the spell takes effect.
